name: Spot The Hidden Objects - Free Kids Puzzle Games
name_original: Spot The Hidden Objects - Free Kids Puzzle Games
description:
Fun seek and find objects hunting game that challenges you to solve tons of different picture puzzles and problems one by one.

Beware of the time limit! Indeed, you have a defined period of time to find all the objects! A fast analysis is required!

Come try it now and share it with your friends.its free!
